question: Which among the following is best described as opportunity cost?
option1: Difference between the return on chosen option and the return on best forgone option
option3: Difference between the return this year and the previous year
answer: Difference between the return on chosen option and the return on best forgone option
explanation: Opportunity costs represent the benefits an individual, investor or business misses out on when choosing one alternative over another. It is the \"cost\" incurred by not enjoying the benefit associated with the best alternative choice.
